newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy offers new 3-yr, 5-yr bonds for auction.
newsitem.headline: Italy offers new 3-yr, 5-yr bonds for auction.

text.p: The Italian Treasury said it will issue new three and five fixed rate bonds (BTP) at its regular end-month auction and reopen existing issues of 10-year BTPs and seven year floating rate certificates (CCT)
The Treasury said in a statement said it would offer:
* 1st tranche 1/10/96 3-yr BTPs paying a 7.50 percent coupon vs previous 8.25 percent.
* 1st tranche 15/09/96 5-yr BTPs paying a 7.75 percent coupon versus previous 8.25 percent coupon.
The amount of paper to be offered will be announced on September 24.
Subscriptions for the CCT and 10-year BTP auctions close at 1100 GMT September 27..
Subscriptions for the three and five year BTP auctions close at 1100 GMT September 30. -- Rome newsroom +396 6782501
